channel.title: Java Errors at compiler
channel.description:
Here's the problem=
i am using Allstarscapev2 and when i'm trying to use compiler it says ::
you do not have any jdk 5. or jdk 6. installed or you do not have jdk 5. or 6. updated go to mod taharok's turtorial on moparscape turtorials section(WICH I CAN'T FIND)
now ppl say just go download Java Jdk6u17 (newest one) i have like 6times installed reinstalled that and it still says same.. help is welcome :)
Greetz, Eson

item.title: Java Errors at compiler
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

i don’t think you’ve added your environment variables right…

Read full topic

item.title: Java Errors at compiler
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:2, topic:321009”]Place this in your compile… and wala it’s fixed…
this is an auto compile and run…

@echo off title TestScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title TestScape Server color 0a java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/quote]now it says system can’t find given pad or somthing then exeption in thread made by java at at at at with some java stuff after…

Read full topic

item.title: Java Errors at compiler
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Place this in your compile… and wala it’s fixed…
this is an auto compile and run…

@echo off title TestScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title TestScape Server color 0a java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
